Articles.Content: and as you say that, I explode your room. my crater.
Dang, you people are violent. Have you no sense of trade, or compromise? Why resort to immediate hostility?

> 
> and as you say that, I explode your room. my crater.

I put a lot of dirt in it. **a lot** of dirt.

My filled crater.

I give you a 20000 karat diamond 

you give me the hill my hill

I sue you for stealing: never sold you the crater.

For the law, you just gave me a huge diamond then stole **my** crater. 

The court give me reason. My hill now.

I give you platinum you alow friendship 

are hill

I preform necromancy! By suprise!

My undead spooky scary skeleton army. 

CONFORM TO MY DEMANDS. CONFORM TO MY DEMANDS. CONFORM TO MY DEMANDS. WE ARE THE BORG. WE WILL ASSIMILATE YOUR CULTERAL ASPECTS INTO OUR OWN. RESISTANCE IS FUTILE.

I unleash a horde of excitable, playful and hungry dogs on your skeletal army.

My pack of happy dogs.
Still are hill

Remember Vanamonde's warnings earlier? REMEMBER IT.

I hack the hill, and take it.

My digitally animated hill.

I send a virus to the digital hill, sending it back into the real world.

My hill.

I nuke it from orbit my crater wich I cover in cement making it a bunker with defenses with one weakness and it also exists online offline in the real world and in versions of the univers (no waking up crap)
I collect data from every hill in statement right now, and use the nearest plot of land 15 kilometers in diameter, and turn it into a holoprojection-based simulation of hills.
While you do that I'm sitting in my fortified bunker sipping hot chocolate and eating cookies waiting to be attacked

I send in bears with rockets on them. They go straight through the projection.

My holoprojection-based simulation of hills.

You barge right in, and you destroy my technology? I'd have half a mind to turn you into the first living crater! ...But, I will propose this:

Help repair our holoprojectors, and you can leave unharmed. Refusal to comply will be a very bad decision...

So, what'll it be?

I detonate a vacuum metastability bomb, killing you both. I reset the multiverse, and find a hill.

My hill. And reminder: NO ROLEPLAYING PLZ.
I download I virus into your organic matter you doe my hill

> 
> I detonate a vacuum metastability bomb, killing you both. I reset the multiverse, and find a hill.
> My hill. And reminder: NO ROLEPLAYING PLZ.

Vacuum metastability bomb? So, a weapon designed to target a theoretical matter that may not even exist? At least make sure your weapons are effective before launching them. If you weren't already dead, you still would have been killed anyway.

As for what happened to you, I guess I should thank the one who did it. You may spend 2 days within our simulation once it is repaired.

I deny your right to roleplay, causing your defences to fall apart for me to waltz in and claim the hill.

my hill with feeble cardboard roleplay costumes.

9.99E+938373920293747392937499374739 ÃŽâ€ icbm nukes coming after you there is no hiding 

my half blowin up earth
...Are you kidding!? That's enough energy to take out the observable universe! And then some!

My vacuum metastability bomb **works**, and we cease to exist. Then, somewhere else in the Bulk, a new universe is born. 13.7 Bya later, i find a hill and place a flag on it.

My hill.
I land 15 imperial knights. my hill for a long time.

I wait 50 years for the imperial knights to get senile.

Then, my rocket bears crash into said knights, launching them into space.

My hill.
